00068 // exit status codes
00069 #define ES_NORMAL               0       // no errors
00070 #define ES_INCONSIST            1       // traceroute got inconsistent host addrs
00071 #define ES_INITWINSOCK          2       // Win32: unable to initialize WinSock
00072 #define ES_UNKOPTION            3       // unknown command line option
00073 #define ES_RAWSOCK_CANT         4       // can't get raw socket (PreOpen)
00074 #define ES_HOSTNAME_CANT        5       // can't resolve hostname
00075 #define ES_LOCALHOST_CANT       6       // can't resolve localhost
00076 #define ES_RAWSOCK_FAIL         7       // can't get raw socket (Open)
00077 #define ES_SETSOCKOPT_FAIL      8       // setsockopt failed
00078 #define ES_BAD_HOSTNAME         9       // missing or invalid hostname
